text:
Alexander MacDonald "Sandy" Keith (November 22, 1928 – October 3, 2020) was an American Democratic politician and jurist. Keith was born in Rochester, Minnesota.
He was a member of the Minnesota Senate between 1959 to 1963. He was the 37th Lieutenant Governor between 1963 to 1967. He was an associate justice and chief justice of the Minnesota Supreme Court between 1989 to 1998.
Keith died on October 3, 2020 at the age of 91.
